body_html: I fixed the low-hanging comments. I also realized we forgot to add tests for LogNormal and HalfNormal, so I added them as well. I think scipy's lognorm.entropy() link is incorrect. so I omitted that test (it passes the monte carlo test).
body_text: I fixed the low-hanging comments. I also realized we forgot to add tests for LogNormal and HalfNormal, so I added them as well. I think scipy's lognorm.entropy() link is incorrect. so I omitted that test (it passes the monte carlo test).
body: I fixed the low-hanging comments. I also realized we forgot to add tests for `LogNormal` and `HalfNormal`, so I added them as well. I think scipy's `lognorm.entropy()` [link](https://github.com/scipy/scipy/blob/11509c4a98edded6c59423ac44ca1b7f28fba1fd/scipy/stats/_continuous_distns.py#L3641) is incorrect. so I omitted that test (it passes the monte carlo test).
